title: @Champ Up @Skins Team; Can we get a hint on if any of the upcoming reworks will get a release skin?
body:
Specifically interested in Poppy
She hasn't had a skin in ages

Also Sion still hasn't had one since his update...

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Unfortunately, we don't hint/announce skins an advance. While it's not common, there are times where content is moved to a later date, shelved, or even scrapped because it's not working out. We don't want to get players hyped for a new skin, and then have it be delayed, or not released.

I'm gonna make so many people mad right now.



Ao Shin.
Shen deserves a skin on release tho, I mean seriously... It will soon be 4 yrs since he had a skin
but nobody cares about poppy. Shen needs a skin also
I want poppy to have a new skin too. Why would you say nobody cares about poppy when they do?

> [{quoted}](name=EliteSkillz,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EMN9loOc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-02T16:12:30.333+0000)
>
> but nobody cares about poppy. Shen needs a skin also

I care about Poppy {{item:3070}}
but nobody cares about shen. Poppy needs a skin also
I hope poppy gets a VU ontop of that. Maybe some new splash art. She looks so silly lol.

poppy's getting a visual and gameplay update and confirmed here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule
